description: OPINION AND ORDER   Signed by the Honorable Sara L. Ellis on 5/9/2023. For the foregoing reasons, the Court grants in part and denies in part Defendants' motion to dismiss [Case No. 21 C 2890, Doc. 44; Case No. 21 C 6841, Doc. 18].  The Court di smisses the fraud, promissory fraud, negligent misrepresentation, and equitable estoppel claims (Counts I, II, III, and V) against both Defendants and the breach of fiduciary duty claim (Count IV) only against Ascend with prejudice.    Emailed notice.  (cdh, )
